name: Milkan's Simple Hit Counter
author: Milkan Trninic

sections.description:
• This versatile plugin allows you to seamlessly integrate a visitor counter into your website, now with enhanced capabilities! Not only can you track overall visits, but you can also monitor individual post and product views. No need for IP tracking control—this plugin relies on cookie tracking.
  • No IP tracking control, this plugin use cookie tracking.
  • it will track posts and products also.
sections.installation:
1. Begin by uploading the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/milkanscounter directory. Alternatively, you can install the plugin directly through the WordPress plugins screen.
  2. Activate the plugin via the ‘Plugins’ screen in your WordPress dashboard.
  3. Navigate to your theme and locate the “footer.php” file. Here, you can effortlessly insert the counter.
  4. The counter starts at 0, but feel free to adjust this value as needed.
  5. Use the shortcode [milkanscounter start=”100″ frontpagehit=”Number of visits” singlehit=”Post viewed”] for front page hits and individual post or product views.

Template code is

<?php echo do_shortcode( '[milkanscounter start="322989" frontpagehit="Broj posjeta" singlehit="Stranica pogledana"]' ); ?>

Post code is

[milkanscounter start="100" frontpagehit="Number of visits" singlehit="Post viewed"]
sections.faq:
Why doesn’t the counter update when I refresh or revisit my website?

Fear not! The counter relies on cookie tracking, which prevents recounting visits.

What’s the cookie expiration time?

The cookie remains active for 30 days.
